UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
METROPOLITAN CORRECTIONAL CENTER, NEW YORK, NY
DAILY LIEUTENANT'S LOG

SHIFT-DAY-DATE: D/W - Friday, August 09, 2019 Beginning Count: [b(7)(F)] SHU [b(7)(F)]
D/W Daily Sensitive Information:
I/M [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] on Suicide Watch w/inmate companion
I/M [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] on Psych obs. w/inmate companion.
I/M [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] on DRY Cell w/staff watch in R&D.
8:00 AM Lieutenant C. Perez assumes duties as the Day Watch Operations Lieutenant. The fire alarm and pump system is inoperable at this time. Fire Watch is in Progress. Unable to conduct PREA announcement over the Institution Public Address System, due to, system malfunction. Restraint Equipment Cage inventory conducted. All equipment accounted for. Metal Detector checks conducted. All equipment w/exception of Rear Gate "Soft Gate" is secure. Temporay Chit Inventory: [b(7)(F)] Hosp: 0 [b(7)(E); (b)(7)(F)] Daily Hand Stamp

8:50 AM [b(7)(E)] Testing Complete.

10:00 AM [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] E08-562L FT REL -1

11:24 AM [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] new commit +1
12:30 PM PM Census Conducted
12:35 PM [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] return from L-Hosp +1
1:10 PM I/M [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] off suicide watch
2:41 PM -1 I/M [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] from IN to TREATY TRANS
3:15 PM I/M [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] placed on dry cell from ZA
3:45 PM Institutional lockdown for count.
